Hello,

I'm launching crawls with the max-document-download setting set to =
50,
but the crawls keep running even after 50 docs are downloaded.

I am us=
ing Heritrix 2.0.2 on Suse Linux 10, JDK 1.6.

An interesting note, though.=
.. If I pause the job then resume it after
more than 50 docs have been down=
loaded, then the settings seem to kick
in and the job terminates immediatel=
y due to max data limit.  

Any help is appreciated... 

Adam
